function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage in nursing staff","Impact":"Inadequate care to patients","Mitigation":"Recruitment of more nursing staff, better work conditions","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Patients, healthcare sector","Owner":"Hospital management, government"},{"Description":"Absenteeism and presenteeism among nurses","Impact":"Decreased workforce, higher risk of infection spread","Mitigation":"Flexible work arrangements, mental health support, transportation assistance","Technologies":"Remote work technology, mental health apps","People":"Nurses, hospital management","Owner":"Hospital management, government"},{"Description":"Infection among nurses","Impact":"Increased spread of coronavirus, reduced staff capacity","Mitigation":"Infection control measures, education on safe practices, improved transportation","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, infection tracking systems","People":"Nurses, hospital management, patients","Owner":"Hospital management, government"}]}
